import React from 'react'; import '../../Styles/News.css'; import '../../App.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faFacebook, faFacebookF, faInstagram, faTwitter } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; export default function NewsContent(props) { const news = {}; if (props.news) { Object.assign(news,props.news) // gán obj props.news vào news console.log(news); } return(
